archimate:Folder.name: Installing from source on Windows
archimate:Folder.documentation: The BUILDING.md document referenced previously has instructions. One uses the build tools from Visual Studio, or else the full Visual Studio 2017 product: Visual Studio 2017: https:/​/​www.​visualstudio.​com/​downloads/​ Build tools: https:/​/​www.​visualstudio.​com/​downloads/​#build-​tools- for-​visual-​studio-​2017 Three additional tools are required: Git for Windows: http:/​/​git-​scm.​com/​download/​win Python: https:/​/​www.​python.​org/​ OpenSSL: https:/​/​www.​openssl.​org/​source/​ and https:/​/​wiki. openssl.​org/​index.​php/​Binaries Then, run the included .\vcbuild script to perform the build.
